If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga

Imagine getting triggered by character being drugged and imagining things, but still resisting. She just proved her loyalty to him by not giving in to the drug, which in 95% of doujin doesn't happen. Nhentai is starting to turn into Twitter and fuck that honestly.

To make it a little clearer, in the postscript for this chapter he does address the issue. He roughly says that this chapter may have worried the audience in the first half but to be rest assured that Akiko will continue to be solely for Yuichi. From what I understand he wants to portray her as being desperately aroused because of the jam/drug but resisting for Yuichi's sake (which is why she thanks the Aunt for saving her). There are also a few translation mistakes. On pg.12 she says "I hope he's ready, I'm going to touch a delicate part of his body" which is wrong, she basically addressing that his hands are going towards a delicate part of HER body.

This chapter portrays her in a totally different color, prior to this I was thinking of her as a cute milf who simply fell in love with her nephew and was pretty happy with their relationship but now all I can see is a middle-aged woman so horny that it doesn't who it is as long as they have a dick (even if the guy is her nephew...). Truly disappointed and I couldn't care less about the apology since it is not sincere, if by any chance this hadn't received the backclash it did he would have continued in this direction, and as with birthday presents "it's the intention that matters". Honestly don't know how TF nobody tried to warn him of how stupid this move was...
A very very uncomfortable read. Im glad this is the only chapter that’s like this
